enchantment.deepseeksenchant.split.desc: Attacked mobs will split infinitely following f(n)=2ⁿ⁺¹ -1 (n=split count).§4(WARNING: Severe lag will occur if not cleaned promptly!)§r
enchantment.deepseeksenchant.snipe.desc: After attacking, triggers a cooldown equal to (target's current health / 10) × 3 seconds. The 6th consecutive hit deals massive damage.§r
enchantment.deepseeksenchant.chaos_damag: Based on the weapon's base damage, each §lpoint§r of damage dealt is randomly converted into a damage type (e.g., fall damage, suffocation, etc.).[Currently only works with Cyclic Mod Automated User]§r
enchantment.deepseeksenchant.pure_chaos_: Based on the weapon's base damage, each §linstances§r of damage dealt is randomly converted into a damage type (e.g., fall damage, suffocation, etc.).[Currently only works with Cyclic Mod Automated User]§r
enchantment.deepseeksenchant.dance_dance: Enchanted weapons will display arrows in the Actionbar. Pressing them in order increases damage by 20% (can be stacked multiple times).§r
enchantment.deepseeksenchant.berserk_cho: Fully charged attacks release a shockwave in an area, but attack power is reduced.§r
enchantment.deepseeksenchant.omniguard.d: Provides 360-degree protection while blocking. Durability consumption tripled.§r
enchantment.deepseeksenchant.advancement: Increases attack damage based on advancements.§r
enchantment.deepseeksenchant.mod_blessin: Increases attack damage based on installed mods.§r
enchantment.deepseeksenchant.time_blessi: Increases attack damage based on the number of daylight cycles.§r
enchantment.deepseeksenchant.biome_bless: Increases health based on the number of different biomes visited.§r
enchantment.deepseeksenchant.grenadier.d: Allows throwing TNT and Fire Charges as projectiles.§r
enchantment.deepseeksenchant.blood_feedi: Use your own health to heal pets. Be careful not to feed the water bottle to pets.
enchantment.deepseeksenchant.iron_head.d: Smashes blocks above your head. Higher levels break harder blocks.
enchantment.deepseeksenchant.illiteracy_: Make you unable to read some words clearly.§r
enchantment.deepseeksenchant.visual_impa: Displays all textures as missing when wearing the enchanted helmet
enchantment.deepseeksenchant.robbery.des: Killing villagers drops items from their trade lists. Higher levels increase drop chances. Drops emeralds if no trades exist. Causes severe reputation loss with nearby villagers.§r
enchantment.deepseeksenchant.giant_growt: Right-click a sapling while holding 64 bone meal to grow a colossal 1000-block diameter tree. §4§lWARNING: §cMay cause severe lag! Use with caution!§r
enchantment.deepseeksenchant.regurgitati: Allows regurgitating eaten food. The regurgitated food only restores half the original hunger value when consumed again.§r
enchantment.deepseeksenchant.dimensional: Prevents you from teleporting to other dimensions.§r
enchantment.deepseeksenchant.deepdarksca: Converts nearby Sculk Shriekers to summon-capable state and activates them immediately (requires at least one signal), spawning multiple Wardens locked onto the player.§r
enchantment.deepseeksenchant.elder_guard: Summons the Elder Guardian's curse particles around the wearer, creating a disturbing visual effect.§r
enchantment.deepseeksenchant.disguise_an: Abandoned enchantment, remove all NBT tag and change the name when the item's durability is not satisfied.§r
enchantment.deepseeksenchant.fragile.des: Makes any item without durability 500 points of durability.§r
/gianttree generate - Generate default oak giant tree (100 blocks tall)
/gianttree generate <trunkBlock> <foliageBlock> - Customize trunk and foliage blocks
Due to technical limitations, block ID tab completion is not available.
command.deepseeksenchant.gianttree.error: Can only be executed in server environment
command.deepseeksenchant.gianttree.gener: Generating a %s-block tall giant tree using %s for trunk and %s for foliage...
message.deepseeksenchant.pure_chaos.head: §6⚡ Pure Chaos Damage
message.deepseeksenchant.bone_meal.tip: Your bone meal is not enough!
message.deepseeksenchant.deception.tip: The Enchantment is fake, You've been cheated!
message.deepseeksenchant.deception.name: You've been cheated!
config.deepseeksenchant.enchantments.dee: Call of the Deep Dark Enchantment
